advantages.name: Strongbow
advantages.notes: Let you ignore some penalties when shooting a bow too strong for you

children.name: Rapid Magical Recovery
children.notes: 15 points of tally recovered a day

modifiers.name: People Affected
modifiers.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

children.name: Delusion (The outdoors are always safer than in a building)

equipment.notes: Sighting Aids + Bow Silencer + Fixed Scope (4x) + Styling (x2) + Hip Bone Carrier
Flexible. DR8 vs. pi, cut. +1 from fortify

children.notes: 1 second per 5 yards, lingers for 1-4 minutes
Changes damage to piercing with armor divisor of (2).
1 second per 5 yards, lingers for 1-4 minutes
Minimum gear for camping: -2 to any Survival roll without it. Includes utensils, tinderbox or flint and steel, towel, etc., as TL permits.
A complete kit for treating wounds, with bandages, ointments, etc.

notes.text:
Smoke 
Contact detonation 
Smoke clouds take 1 sec per 5 yards to form and linger for 1-4 minutes depending on weather conditions. 
Smoke clouds provide a -10 penalty for visually aimed attacks or sighting through them. 
Cost: $200 ea.

Explosive 
Contact detonation 
15mm explosive warhead. Damage: 2d cr ex (no fragmentation) 
Cost: $400 ea. 

All the materials are sourced from some experimental military weapons the gadgeteer obtained from a scavenger.
